ygData.subject: Re: Bard Hate (was: Twinking)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You cannot play any beneficial songs in Guk if you wanna just look around, otherwise you will: 1) Take factions hits from monsters you are not fighting. 2)
ygData.messageBody:
>And yet when I did run into blues they attacked me.
>I assume it's bard hate.

You cannot play any beneficial songs in Guk if you wanna just
look around, otherwise you will:

1) Take factions hits from monsters you are not fighting.
2) Piss off froggies who are borderline wanting to kill you.

Case in point last night. Spec Tower, puller gets 4, decides
to zone, before he even makes it half way there all the specs
turn and head back toward me. I thought it was just lag movement,
and that they were ghosts, and I waited for the client to update
because he pulled them almost out of my visual range, pretty far away.
It updated all right, 4 spectres B-lining for me. I was on shore
no where near them or the tower, and all four, thats right - count
em - FOUR spectres attacked me. The party stuck it out and our group
of four people took on the spectres. But that is damn weird... WTF?
I was no where near the specs, the puller, yet I was manasonging the
others in the group. Stupid Verant - no wonder we die all the time.

Harmonic Distortion, 38th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
